document.full_text: the split within concacaf deepened on wednesday when its acting president insisted the regional soccer governing body's general secretary chuck blazer had been fired and accused him of "waging war."
document.title: acting concacaf president accuses blazer of 'waging war'
lines_and_colors: the split within concacaf deepened on wednesday when its acting president insisted the regional soccer governing body's general secretary chuck blazer had been fired and accused him of "waging war."
